name: spooktober simulator
description:
Spooktober Simulator is a spooky scary horror game featuring spooooky enemies such as MOO MOO, ROBLOX HEAD and SHORTLEGS coming to ki- i mean make you have a good night's sleep :)

Prepare to be spooked by this spooky installment of spookiness! Select your challenge and defeat it! Run for your life from spooky spooksters that will stop at nothing to spook you to spooky death! Careful of the noise you make, because the spooksters might hear you...
